title: Downing Street parties inquiry: Opposition MPs call for independent figure to lead probe
content:
1. Downing Street parties inquiry: Opposition MPs call for independent figure to lead probe  BBC News
  2. No 10 party inquiry head steps down over claims he also broke rules  The Guardian
  3. UK's Johnson appoints new civil servant to 'partygate' probe  The Washington Post
  4. Simon Case has trashed his own career and the office of cabinet secretary in one fell swoop  The Independent
  5. Simon Case is now off the Downing Street Christmas party case – another mess of Boris Johnson’s own making  The Independent
